page.title: 15ROCHESTER AIRPORT
page.content: We expected to see{concrete runways but it was all grass and the cost of Â£1m.to change them would be too much. There were new{landing lights}which change colour as the plane gets lower so the pilot knows when he is at the right angle to land. The largest modern aeroplane we saw was an eight seater{Aztec,}the most common was the two seater{Robin}which cruises at 120mph.{Headcorn Flying {School}use them a lot here and lessons cost Â£15 for 30mins. Our Domesday group wanted to buy a{1960,Piper}on sale for Â£10000! There are 300 {movements}a day at the airport <that is a take off or a landing> or 100,000 per year,that is a lot for a small airport. There were only a few people {employed}there,the airport manager, 2 aircontrollers,1 apprentice and about 4 engineers.
